p: Animals were from a core population of STH sheep in Luxi district of Shandong province, China. We collected jugular vein blood of healthy non-pregnant sheep aged 2–4 years ( n = 890), to identify the FecB genotypes using TaqMan probe [ 45]. Then, 12 sheep (6 MM and 6 ww, respectively) with no significant difference in age, weight, height, body length, chest circumference and tube circumference were selected for this experiment.
